title: Easy chickpea salad
ingredients: ['1 clove garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 (420g) tin chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '1 tomato, chopped', '1/3 onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon cider vinegar (optional)', '1/2 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1 pinch ground black pepper', '1/2 lemon, sliced']
